resources.string: No lyrics were found for this track
Tracks longer than 20 minutes (like podcasts) are not considered songs
Lyrics will automatically refresh every time the music changes
You haven\'t saved any lyrics yet.
Might cause performance issues on older devices
The lyrics you were looking for…\nRight here, right now.
If QuickLyric doesn\'t work with your player (e.g. Poweramp, GoneMAD or Spotify), make sure it has \"Scrobbling\" or \"Broadcast Status\" enabled.
Integration with your favorite MusicID apps.
1. Identify a song\n2. Share the results to QuickLyric\n3. Enjoy your lyrics
Tap this button. QuickLyric will do the rest.
To access other features, tap here (or swipe the screen from the edge).

Get a discreet notification when the song changes
All lyrics will be stored on your device
Display a dark background between 9pm and 6am
QuickLyric will now download the lyrics for a total of %1$d songs.\ Make sure you have a stable connexion for at least %2$d minute(s).
The more you select, the longer each download will take
Improve translations, expand the lyrics catalog,…
